summary.span: 命名空間提供可以讓您實作、安裝和控制 Windows 服務應用程式的類別。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to implement, install, and control Windows service applications.

summary.span: 服務是長時間執行的可執行檔，它執行時不需使用者介面。

span.span: Services are long-running executables that run without a user interface.

summary.span: 服務的實作牽涉繼承自 類別和定義要在啟動、停止、暫停和繼續指令傳入時處理的特定動作，以及系統關機時要採取的自訂行為和動作。

span.span: Implementing a service involves inheriting from the class and defining specific behavior to process when start, stop, pause, and continue commands are passed in, as well as custom behavior and actions to take when the system shuts down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務會使用 InstallUtil.exe 例如安裝公用程式來安裝。Services are installed using an installation utility such as InstallUtil.exe. 命名空間提供的服務資訊寫入登錄的安裝類別。The namespace provides installation classes that write service information to the registry. 類別提供內含類別可安裝元件的一般安裝中的所有服務。The class provides an encompassing class which installs components common to all the services in an installation. 每個服務，您建立的執行個體類別來安裝服務特有的功能。For each service, you create an instance of the class to install service-specific functionality. 類別可讓您連接到現有的服務和管理它或取得它的相關資訊。The class enables you to connect to an existing service and manipulate it or get information about it. 這個類別通常用於管理功能，而且可讓您啟動、 停止、 暫停、 繼續，或在服務上執行自訂命令。This class is typically used in an administrative capacity, and enables you to start, stop, pause, continue, or perform custom commands on a service. 其中類別會定義服務會執行命令時，處理是代理程式，可讓您呼叫服務上的這些命令。Where the class defines the processing a service performs when a command occurs, the is the agent that enables you to call those commands on the service.
